com.swisscom.ais.itext

Class Connect.AliasKeyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swisscom.ais.itext.Connect.AliasKeyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.net.ssl.KeyManager, javax.net.ssl.X509KeyManager
    Enclosing class:
    Connect

    private class Connect.AliasKeyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.net.ssl.X509KeyManager
    Instances manage which certificate-based key pairs are used to authenticate the local side of a secure socket.

      • getPrivateKey

        public java.security.PrivateKey getPrivateKey(java.lang.String privateKeyPath)
        Create private key from file. Creating the key depends on the type. An existing X509 key file can be immediately convert to a PrivateKey object. If source file is a RSA key it is necessary to create a PEMKeyPair first and afterwards convert to PrivateKey object
        Specified by:
        getPrivateKey in interface javax.net.ssl.X509KeyManager
        Parameters:
        privateKeyPath - Path of private key
        Returns:
        PrivateKey if key can be generated otherwise null
